content: Dr. Deena Hinshaw said that the extra doses would hopefully increase the number of people they could immunize with the province’s current share of Canada’s initial shipment of 30,000 doses. #Hinshaw #COVID19AB #vaccine #PfizerBioNTech
date: Coronavirus vaccine vials may hold more doses than previously thought, officials say | Globalnews.caOfficials revealed Thursday that some vials of the coronavirus vaccine could contain six doses, one more than the five previously thought to be in each vial.globalnews.ca
